p: The Uses and Gratification theory is useful in understanding the audiences’ interaction with media content. In the study, it was used to establish the reasons behind communal farmers’ usage of certain media products. Papacharissi and Rubin ( 2000) contend that according to the theory, audiences use certain media products to fulfil their needs. Using the theory allowed communal farmers to provide a description and reasons of their usage of certain media products.
